name: Clean YouTube 2017
description:
Changes parts of youtube to make it flatter and cleaner looking.
It is less cluttered, and a lot of unnecessary lines and background tints have been removed.
additional_info: 1. Messages -------------------------- • This style won't be getting updates for a while now since youtube brought out their own clean updated and dark theme. You can enable it at youtube.com/new. When they roll out this feature to everybody by default I might update this style for the new look. 2. Contributing --------------------------- Be sure to report any issues in the "Discussions" section as I'll fix them as soon as possible. Suggestions are always welcome. Feel free to leave feedback, as it is much appreciated. 3. Change Log -------------------------- current version: v2.1.0 v2.1.0 | Mar 12 2017 • Added option to always display the video date and view count (by default it only shows when hovering over the thumbnail) | Requested by: Bulega v2.0.7 | Jan 11 2017 • Fixed comment username color. Broke in last update | Reported by: Doctor Anonymous v2.0.6 | Jan 9 2017 • Comment of video published made readable v2.0.5 | Oct 28 2016 • prevented search bar from disappearing on smaller screens | Reported by: Ryan Warner v2.0.4 | Oct 18 2016 • Added "watched" badge support for playlists | Reported by: Generic Username • Changed placeholder text in search box to white | Suggested by: kullmine • Improvements to search prediction box v2.0.3 | Jul 18 2016 • Fixed a bug where the report button didn't show up when reporting a comment | Reported by: Matthew Petralia v2.0.2 | Feb 15 2016 • Fixed comment section issues v2.0.1 | Feb 8 2016 • Comment section improvements (seems like YouTube has changed the comment section quite a lot, I'm working on fixing it) v2.0.0 | Feb 3 2016 • link colors (option) | Suggested by: seaside • time stamp improvements | Reported by: Murilo Grillo • view count and publish date improvements • other improvements • completely rewritten for better performance v1.0.3 | Dec 15 2015 • Fixed thumbnails in playlists. • Added alternate row colours in playlists to better distinguish the videos. v1.0.2 | Dec 14 2015 • Minor improvements v1.0.1 | Dec 12 2015 • fixed problem where the searchbar wasn't centered. | Reported by: Fuchinasia v1.0.0 | Dec 2 2015 • First release of this style

discussions.name: Make it compatible with some dark theme
Search bar not showing text when the window is resized
Names not appearing in the comments
